item.title: Automating Kali Configuration With Ansible
item.description: Automating the configuration of new Kali VM’s As I frequently use virtual machines, specifically Kali Linux, for various capture the flags and courses, it is always a hassle to reinstall on a new computer, or if something breaks. I have had a bit of experience with ansible in the past, and have talked with people who have made their own scripts to automate configuring new installations but never got around to doing it myself.
